method.name: GET
method.doc: Search over all public objects in the social graph

param.name: q
param.doc: The search string

param.name: type
param.doc: Supports these types of objects: All public posts (post), people (user), pages (page), events (event), groups (group), check-ins (checkin)

param.name: album
param.doc: Represents the ID of the album object.

param.doc: A name for the test user. The specified name will also be used in the email address assigned to the test user.

method.name: GET
method.doc: All of the subscriptions this application has for real-time notifications.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Adds a real-time notification subscription for this application.

param.name: object
param.doc: Object to monitor - `user`, `permissions`, or `page`.

param.name: fields
param.doc: List of properties for the `object` to monitor.

param.name: callback_url
param.doc: A callback URL to which Facebook will post subscription updates.

param.name: verify_token
param.doc: Token sent in the verification request.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Deletes a real-time notification subscription for this application.

param.name: object
param.doc: Object to monitor - `user`, `permissions`, or `page`. If no object is specified all subscriptions are deleted.

param.name: application
param.doc: Represents the ID of the application object.

method.name: GET
method.doc: The photos, videos, and posts in which this application has been tagged.

param.name: application
param.doc: Represents the ID of the application object.

method.name: GET
method.doc: The translated strings for this application.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Uploads translated strings for this application.

param.name: native_strings
param.doc: A JSON-encoded array of strings to translate. Each element of the string array is an object, with text storing the actual string, description storing the description of the text.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Deletes a translation string for this application.

param.name: native_hashes
param.doc: An array of native hashes. The native hash is a unique identifier of the native string and a description and is generated by the Translations application.

param.name: application
param.doc: Represents the ID of the application object.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Scores for the user and their friends.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Deletes all the scores for the application.

param.name: application
param.doc: Represents the ID of the application object.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Registers an achievement for the application

param.name: achievement
param.doc: Unique URL to the achievement.

param.name: display_order
param.doc: Order of this achievement as it shows up in the achievement stories UI (low to high). For example a display order of 100 will be displayed in the UI before 200. We use this value to surface achievements according to the order the developer has specified. Please make sure this value is unique and increments in the correct order for your achievements.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Unregisters an achievement for the application

param.name: achievement
param.doc: Unique URL to the achievement.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Checkins made to this Place Page by the current user, and friends of the current user

param.name: page
param.doc: Represents the ID of the page object.

method.name: GET
method.doc: The page's profile tabs

method.name: POST
method.doc: Installs a profile tab at the end of the current list of installed tabs for the page

param.name: app_id
param.doc: ID of the application for which to install the tab

param.name: page
param.doc: Represents the ID of the page object.

param.name: tab
param.doc: Represents the ID of the tab.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Updates an installed profile tab for a page

param.name: position
param.doc: Order in which the tab will appear on the profile. Must be after permanent tabs and less than the number of installed tabs. Index starts at 0

param.name: custom_name
param.doc: Name to be used for the tab. If this is set to an empty string, the tab will use the applications default tab name.

param.name: is_non_connection_landing_tab
param.doc: Set this tab as the default landing tab for users who have not liked and are not admins of the Page. If provided, value must be true.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Deletes an installed profile tab (where is_permanent is not true) for a page

param.name: page
param.doc: Represents the ID of the page object.

method.name: GET
method.doc: A list of the Page's admins.

param.name: page
param.doc: Represents the ID of the page object.

method.name: GET
method.doc: A list of the users blocked from the page.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Blocks a user (or users) from posting content to the page

param.name: uids
param.doc: Comma-separated list of the user IDs you wish to block

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Unblocks a user (or users) for the page

param.name: uids
param.doc: Comma-separated list of the user IDs you wish to unblock

param.name: page
param.doc: Represents the ID of the page object.

param.name: user
param.doc: Represents the ID of a user.
